flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: How to mold a face from clay, then make a mold, mold the piece from mache, paing and add hair and eye/mouth stitching.

guide.summary: Smallest of my shrunken heads for use as earrings or necklaces
